thread.title: New York Judge Orders Drug-Addicted Mother to Not Get Pregnant Again
thread.title_full: New York Judge Orders Drug-Addicted Mother to Not Get Pregnant Again

author: Lisa Ryan
title: New York Judge Orders Drug-Addicted Mother to Not Get Pregnant Again
text:
A drug-addicted mother of four was ordered by a New York family court judge to not get pregnant again until she gains custody of her youngest child, a move that has drawn criticism from reproductive rights advocates, the Associated Press reports.

In the order, Family Court Judge Patricia... More Â»
